message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $140.  I think you'll find it's a great deal!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $125 for the item. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to counter with a price of $120 for the item. I believe this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
